title: Roran
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a separate vegetarian (saishoku) menu, with dishes such as sweet and sour vege chicken, vege spring rolls, gyoza, and other soy meat substitutes. Make sure you choose the correct menu. Japanese language only. Directions: from Ikebukuro west exit go left until you past Hotel Metropolitan, cross the big road, and the restaurant will be on the left.
